title: What is project being built on Shaw Hwy in Pender county. Alot of black fence being put up and land being cleared about 3 1/2 miles from 210?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/what-is-being-built-on-shaw-highway-in-pender-county-about-3-5-miles-from-nc-210/
